topic.question: 1. Sgt Walker told his men to hurry. What did he tell them to do?
2. Mr. Smith asked Joe, "Do you have a bank account?" What did Mrs Smith want to know?
option: if Joe had money in a bank
if the account was for Mr. Smith

topic.question: 3. The weatherman says there is a possibility of rain.
option: There will be plenty of rain.

topic.question: 4. The new student is nervous about the test.
option: He is happy about the test.
He thinks the test is easy.
He is worried about the test.

topic.question: 5. Traffic is heavy in town during the rush hour.
option: There are many cars on the street.
There are few cars on the street.

topic.question: 6. Tom got on the wrong bus yesterday. Jim did, too.
option: Tom missed the wrong bus yesterday.
Both Jim and Tom rode the wrong bus.
Jim didn't get on the wrong bus yesterday.

topic.question: 7. Please pass the salt.
8. Jim went to town yesterday with his friend to buy a pair of shoes. Where did he go?
9. Billy has football practice every afternoon at four o'clock. When does he have football practice?
10.  If it clears up, we can have our picnic.
option: We can have a picnic even if it rains.
We can have a picnic if the bus comes.
We can have a picnic if the day is nice.
We can have a picnic if the food comes.

topic.question: 11. The two objects were made from the same mold. How do they look?
12. Mr. Smith went to the cafeteria at seven-thirty. Where did he go?
13. Mr. Lang asked for advice.
14. The wires were hidden in back of engine. Where were the wires hidden?
option: on the right side of the engine

topic.question: 15. He made a list of their duties. What was on the list?
16. John says, "It's nine am and I am leaving right away." When is he leaving?
17. Joe said, "This wind is sharp as a knife." What kind of wind is it?
18. Tom was too late to catch the bus.
option: He didn't get off the bus.

topic.question: 19. The student is confused by all the names.
option: He can't tell one name from another.
He knows all the names very well.

topic.question: 20. I am hoping for a chance to go skating.
option: I want to go skating for a change.
I want an opportunity to go skating.
I want to go skating and to a dance.
I need to get some money before I go skating.

topic.question: 21. You will be sure for a place on the plane if you make a reservation.
option: You will be certain of having a seat.
You will always be able to eat in the airport.
You will be able to see many places on the trip.
You should get your ticket on the plane.

topic.question: 22. Barbara looks like her mother.
option: She is looking for her mother
She is fond of her mother.

topic.question: 23. David takes part in all kinds of activities.
option: He practices only certain types of activities.
He participates in many types of activities.
He enjoys keeping away from activities.
He dislikes various kinds of activities.

topic.question: 24. I see a big storm approaching.
25. His work is known for its quality.
option: He does not have much work.
He does not like to work.

topic.question: 26. I ran into Mr. Noland in a bookstore yesterday.
option: I did not see Mr. Nolan yesterday.
My car hit Mr. Nolan's car yesterday.

topic.question: 27 . They kept their people in mind.
28. Is that a fact?
option: Yes, it grew in my garden.
Yes, my mother made it for me.

topic.question: 29. You should use this weapon for long range only. When should you use it?
option: for a long period of time

topic.question: 30. He put his money in a slot. Where did he put it?
31. The new bank is over on the other side of town. Where is it?
32. Tom said, "I can hardly hear Mary."
option: Mary was sitting in the room.
Mary was not speaking loud enough.

topic.question: 33. On the corner, the new building is under construction.
option: The building has just been built.
The building is not yet finished.
The corner building is being torn down.

topic.question: 34. Some people like to argue all the time.
option: They like to walk against the wind.
They like to talk for or against something.
They like to use the plural.
They like to keep quiet all the time.

topic.question: 35. The cadets were authorized to go to town.
option: The cadets were ordered to go.
The cadets were permitted to go.
The cadets weren't allowed to go.
The cadets thought they shouldn't go.

topic.question: 36. Lt. Mitchell cashed a money order at the post office.
37. The student refrains from smoking when he goes to the library.
option: He doesn't smoke there at all there.
He smokes there now and then.

topic.question: 38. As soon as we arrived, the rain began to fall. When did it start raining?
39. I couldn't stand the constant buzzing of the machine.
40. Mary is dining out this evening.
option: She is going to eat at home.
She is going to fix herself a snack.
She is going to eat at the club.
She is going to go shopping.

topic.question: 41. We had to stand up in the bus on the trip to town.
option: The bus was on the wrong street.
We had to wait for the bus to town.
We had to stand at the bus stop.
All seats on the bus were taken.

topic.question: 42. Mr. Cole asked, "How much is the admission price to the movies?"
option: He asked the name of the movie.
He asked which door to enter.
He asked if the movie has an intermission.

topic.question: 43. Two lesser-known petroleum products are plastic and insecticides.
44, Peter must swallow a pill before breakfast. What must he do before a breakfast?
45. The teacher complained about the bad conduct of the students. What was her complaint?
46. John would rather have a hamburger than a hot dog. What would he rather have?
47.  Mary spent a fourth of her money. How much of it did she spend?
48. The humidity is high this afternoon. What is the weather like?
49. Annette said she got a new filling yesterday. What did she get?
option: a cavity filled by the dentist

topic.question: 50. The woman told her daughter to spread out the tablecloth on the table. What was the daughter told to do with the tablecloth?
51. Be sure you watch carefully before you drive onto the highway.
option: Be sure to look at your watch.
Be sure to get off the road.
Be sure to take care of the car.

topic.question: 52. The car lost the right front tire. What did the car lose?
option: a bolt from the right wheel

topic.question: 53. Did Anna complain about her trip?
option: Yes, she finished the trip a week ago.
Yes, she said she didn't like the food or the people.
No, she went both ways by boat.
No, she had many suitcases with her.

topic.question:
54. Beatrice found many unusual shells.
She was walking _________.
55. Mr. King is a flexible man.
56. Mr. Reed is a blacksmith in our town.
option: He makes iron shoes for horses.
He mixes sand and gravel for cement.

topic.question:
57. W: What's the problem?
M: The water in this pipe is frozen.
Q: How did this happen?

58. M: Do you have any pets at home?
W: Yes, I have two dogs.
M: Don't you have any cats?
W: No, I hate cats.
Q: What does the woman mean?
option: She wants a cat for a pet.

topic.question:
59. W: Are you ready to go?
M: I will be as soon as I change my shirt.
Q: What is the man going to do?

60. W: What do you need?
M: I need more of this chemical.
Q: What is the man probably doing?

61. W: What is your city famous for?
M: It's a seaport.
Q: What is the city known for?
option: It's a place where soldiers are trained.
It's a place where ships come and go.
It's a place where people go to college.
It's a place where machinery is manufactured.

topic.question:
62. M: I like doing this.
W: I know, but what is your goal?
Q: What does the woman want to know?
option: how long the man has been there
what the man is trying to do

topic.question:
63. W: This restaurant is very crowded.
M: I know. But I called to reserve a table.
Q: What does the man mean?
option: Places are being saved for them.
A special meal is being prepared for them.
There is a crowd there to greet them.

topic.question:
64. W: Is this alright?
M: I don't know. We need to measure it first.
Q: What does the man want to do first?
option: find out how big it is

topic.question:
65. M: What did you think of the book?
W: The ending is very abrupt.
Q: What did the woman think?
option: She thought the ending was good.
She thought the ending was obvious.
She thought the ending was sudden.
She thought the ending was bad.

topic.question:
66. W: Why are you whispering?
M: My throat is very soar today.
Q: What is the man doing?
